title: COAS visits Logistics, transport facility
content:
Chief of Army Staff (COAS) General Qamar Javed Bajwa Monday visited a Logistics installation and workshop for the military vehicles of the Pakistan Army here at Rawalpindi.
The COAS visited various facilities and infrastructures of the workshop handling a vast range of specialized transport items for the Army.
He was briefed on the facilities being developed, up-gradation mechanism of vehicles, and handling of the Central Stores, the ISPR said in a statement.
The Chief of Army Staff appreciated the performance and commitment of the workshop in the provision of top-class maintenance facilities and services as per standard engineering practices in line with modern standards.
Earlier on arrival, COAS was received by Lieutenant General Azhar Saleh Abbasi, Chief of Logistic Staff (CLS).
